resources.string:
Select a number which is displayed on the screen\n
Number will not be selected if it vanishes\n
All the tickets must be crossed in order to win\n
First three people to win will be awarded points\n
First-40 points\n
Second-25 points\n
Third-15 points

There will be 10 questions in total\n
One question will appear at a time\n
Select only one option\n
There is a time limit for each question\n
10 marks will be awarded for correct answer

Each person will get 15 spins a day\n
Enter the number that you want to match\n
30 points will be awarded for the correct match
